name: jr0cket.github.io
tagline: Developer tools and Clojure functional programming
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages of @jr0cket, community developer.

I have create several presentations on developer tools and using Clojure for functional programming. Each slide deck is an HTML5 webpage for easy viewing.  Each presentation was written in plain text using Emacs Org-mode and converted into HTML that use the JavaScript and CSS from Reveal.js.  

I currently have the following presentations published

* [Getting started with Git](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/getting-started-with-git.html) - **work in progress**
* [Even Developers can present](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/even-developers-can-present.html) - a brief to giving your first talk 
* [Getting started with Clojure](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/getting-started-with-clojure.html)
* [Presenting with Emacs](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/presenting-with-emacs.html)
* [Introduction to RevealJS (the original)](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/revealjs.html)


I also write articles on these topics and many more at [blog.jr0cket.co.uk](http://blog.jr0cket.co.uk) and can be reached via [twitter](http://twitter.com/jr0cket)

I have some older presentations on [SlideShare.net](http://www.slideshare.net/JR0cket)

Thank you.
John Stevenson
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
